description: Massive distributed denial of service attack targeting all public-facing services
impact: Global service disruption affecting 2.5 million users across 15 countries. Revenue impact exceeding $2 million per hour. All customer services experiencing severe degradation or complete unavailability.
affected_system: Downstream: All Web Services, Mobile Applications, API Gateway, CDN Network, DNS Services, Load Balancers. Upstream: Primary Data Centers, Cloud Infrastructure, Network Providers, Security Appliances, DDoS Mitigation Services

description: Core data center power failure with backup generator malfunction
impact: Complete infrastructure outage in primary data center. 500+ servers offline. Critical business applications down. Estimated recovery time 4-6 hours. Revenue loss projected at $1.5 million.
affected_system: Downstream: E-commerce Platform, Customer Portal, Mobile Backend, Analytics Systems, Reporting Tools. Upstream: Power Grid, UPS Systems, Backup Generators, Cooling Systems, Network Infrastructure

description: Enterprise-wide ransomware attack encrypting critical business data
impact: All business-critical data encrypted across 200+ servers. Customer data, financial records, and operational systems compromised. Complete business halt. Regulatory notifications required. Potential data breach affecting 3 million customer records.
affected_system: Downstream: All Business Applications, Customer Database, Financial Systems, HR Systems, Email Services. Upstream: File Servers, Database Servers, Application Servers, Backup Systems, Security Infrastructure

description: Cloud provider regional outage affecting all hosted services
impact: Complete service unavailability in US-East-1 region. 800+ virtual machines offline. Multi-region failover initiated but experiencing issues. Customer impact across North and South American markets.
affected_system: Downstream: All Cloud Services, Load Balancers, Auto-scaling Groups, Database Services, Storage Services. Upstream: AWS US-East-1, Network Connectivity, DNS Resolution, CDN Edge Locations

description: Global DNS resolution failure preventing domain name access
impact: All company domains inaccessible worldwide. Email delivery failing. Mobile apps unable to connect. Complete digital presence offline. Brand reputation at severe risk.
affected_system: Downstream: All Web Properties, Email Services, Mobile Applications, API Endpoints. Upstream: DNS Providers, Domain Registrars, Network Infrastructure, CDN Services

description: Mass data corruption in primary customer database affecting 5 million records
impact: Customer profiles, order history, and payment information corrupted. Data integrity compromised across all customer-facing systems. Potential permanent data loss. Recovery from backups estimated 8-12 hours.
affected_system: Downstream: Customer Portal, E-commerce Platform, CRM System, Marketing Automation, Analytics. Upstream: Primary Database Cluster, Replication Services, Backup Systems, Data Validation Services

description: Supply chain management system completely offline during peak ordering period
impact: Unable to process purchase orders, track inventory, or manage supplier relationships. Black Friday preparation severely impacted. Potential stockouts across 500+ product lines.
affected_system: Downstream: Procurement Portal, Inventory Management, Supplier Communications, Order Processing. Upstream: ERP System, Database Services, Integration Platform, External Supplier APIs

description: Customer service phone system experiencing complete outage during high volume period
impact: All customer service phone lines down. 500+ customer service representatives unable to take calls. Customer complaints escalating on social media. Estimated 10,000+ calls unable to reach support.
affected_users: All customers requiring phone support, 500+ CSRs
affected_system: Downstream: Call Center Software, IVR Systems, Call Routing, CRM Integration. Upstream: Telecom Provider, SIP Trunking, PBX Systems, Network Infrastructure

description: Marketing automation platform sending duplicate emails to entire customer base
impact: 5 million customers receiving duplicate promotional emails. Unsubscribe rates spiking. Brand reputation damage. Email service provider threatening account suspension due to spam complaints.
affected_system: Downstream: Email Campaigns, Customer Communications, Unsubscribe Management. Upstream: Marketing Platform, Email Service Provider, Customer Database, Campaign Management

description: Financial reporting system generating incorrect quarterly revenue figures
impact: Q3 financial reports showing 15% revenue discrepancy. SEC filing deadline at risk. Audit committee emergency meeting scheduled. Potential regulatory compliance issues.
affected_users: All finance team, executive leadership, external auditors
affected_system: Downstream: Financial Reports, SEC Filings, Executive Dashboards, Audit Systems. Upstream: ERP System, Revenue Recognition Engine, Data Warehouse, Financial Database
